subject: re : [junit] JU3.5 problem: debugging with JBuilder4
msgSnippet: No loading accepts an argument ? Which one do you pass ? Do you restart the test each time ? java -cp %cp% junit. ui.TestRunner -noloading
messageBody:
No loading accepts an argument ?
Which one do you pass ?
Do you restart the test each time ?

java -cp %cp% junit.<your>ui.TestRunner -noloading <some_package>.* <Your_Target_Class>

Rgds,

Thomas,
